level.text: 516.1 Each applicant for certification as an Emergency Medical Responder (EMR) shall submit an application to the Director. The application shall include:
A copy of a valid NREMT-First Responder (or greater) certification card;
A copy of a valid American Heart Association (AHA) Health Care Provider (or equivalent) CPR card;
A completed application signed by the sponsoring EMS agency’s medical director; and
A check or money order made out in the appropriate fee made payable to the D.C. Treasurer (if applicable).
Upon receipt of a complete application, the Director shall review the application and, if approved, shall issue a D.C. EMR certification card.
